description: This file defines a React hook called useLocalNotes that manages notes persisted in localStorage. It provides functions to create, update, delete, select notes, and filter notes based on search text. The hook maintains state for notes, selected note ID, and filter text, and it exports an API for use in React components.

methods.name: makeId()
methods.description: Creates a unique identifier for a note using timestamp and random values.

methods.name: getNextSelection(notes, deletedId)
methods.description: Determines the next note ID to select after deleting a note.

methods.name: useLocalNotes()
methods.description: Main React hook that manages notes state with persistent storage, provides functions for CRUD operations and filtering.
